title: Opening Remarks of Chairman Heck (US House of Representatives Committee on Armed Services)
text: ( Source : US House of Representatives Committee on Armed Services ) WASHINGTON - Today , Rep. Joseph Heck (R-NV), Chairman of the House Armed Services Subcommittee on Military Personnel , made the following remarks on the hearing titled ' Update
